=-- Upsert customer first (if not exists)
-- Contact ID is used as customer printavo_id since invoices link to contacts
INSERT INTO customers (printavo_id, name, first_name, last_name, email, phone, company, created_at, updated_at, published_at)
VALUES (
  '{{ $json.customer_printavo_id }}',
  '{{ (($json.customer_first_name || '') + ' ' + ($json.customer_last_name || '')).trim().replace(/'/g, "''") || $json.customer_company.replace(/'/g, "''") || 'Unknown' }}',
  '{{ ($json.customer_first_name || '').replace(/'/g, "''") }}',
  '{{ ($json.customer_last_name || '').replace(/'/g, "''") }}',
  '{{ $json.customer_email || '' }}',
  '{{ $json.customer_phone || '' }}',
  '{{ ($json.customer_company || '').replace(/'/g, "''") }}',
  NOW(),
  NOW(),
  NOW()
)
ON CONFLICT (printavo_id) DO UPDATE SET
  name = CASE WHEN customers.name LIKE 'Placeholder%' THEN EXCLUDED.name ELSE customers.name END,
  first_name = COALESCE(NULLIF(EXCLUDED.first_name, ''), customers.first_name),
  last_name = COALESCE(NULLIF(EXCLUDED.last_name, ''), customers.last_name),
  email = COALESCE(NULLIF(EXCLUDED.email, ''), customers.email),
  phone = COALESCE(NULLIF(EXCLUDED.phone, ''), customers.phone),
  company = COALESCE(NULLIF(EXCLUDED.company, ''), customers.company),
  updated_at = NOW();

=-- Upsert order (invoice)
INSERT INTO orders (
  printavo_id, visual_id, nickname, status, 
  total_amount, tax_amount, discount,
  production_notes, customer_notes, due_date,
  printavo_customer_id,
  created_at, updated_at, published_at
)
VALUES (
  '{{ $json.printavo_id }}',
  '{{ $json.visual_id }}',
  '{{ ($json.nickname || '').replace(/'/g, "''") }}',
  '{{ $json.status }}',
  {{ $json.total_amount || 0 }},
  {{ $json.tax_amount || 0 }},
  {{ $json.discount_amount || 0 }},
  '{{ ($json.production_notes || '').replace(/'/g, "''") }}',
  '{{ ($json.customer_note || '').replace(/'/g, "''") }}',
  {{ $json.due_date ? "'" + $json.due_date + "'" : 'NULL' }},
  '{{ $json.customer_printavo_id }}',
  {{ $json.created_at ? "'" + $json.created_at + "'" : 'NOW()' }},
  {{ $json.updated_at ? "'" + $json.updated_at + "'" : 'NOW()' }},
  NOW()
)
ON CONFLICT (printavo_id) DO UPDATE SET
  visual_id = EXCLUDED.visual_id,
  nickname = EXCLUDED.nickname,
  status = EXCLUDED.status,
  total_amount = EXCLUDED.total_amount,
  tax_amount = EXCLUDED.tax_amount,
  discount = EXCLUDED.discount,
  production_notes = EXCLUDED.production_notes,
  customer_notes = EXCLUDED.customer_notes,
  due_date = EXCLUDED.due_date,
  updated_at = EXCLUDED.updated_at
RETURNING id, printavo_id;

=-- Link order to customer via orders_customer_lnk
INSERT INTO orders_customer_lnk (order_id, customer_id, order_ord)
SELECT 
  o.id,
  c.id,
  1
FROM orders o
CROSS JOIN customers c
WHERE o.printavo_id = '{{ $json.printavo_id }}'
  AND c.printavo_id = '{{ $json.customer_printavo_id }}'
  AND NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 FROM orders_customer_lnk ocl WHERE ocl.order_id = o.id
  );
